attributes.action: GIVE COMPASSIONATE WORK PERMITS TO THOSE IN BRITAIN ILLEGALLY FROM 3 YEARS ON.
attributes.additional_details:
These good qualities of the Brits have endeared them to the world, and many nationals from many poverty stricken and war torn nations run to Britain to seek refuge and live meaningful lives of quality Britain offers.
Those in Britain illegally without crime and want to add values to her should be given work permits.
I believe doing this will increase the production capacity, wealth and sources of income of Britain and show Britain as the true nation of intelligent and compassionate people.
attributes.background:
GIVE COMPASSIONATE WORK PERMITS TO THOSE LIVING IN BRITAIN ILLEGALLY FROM 3 YEARS ABOVE.
The British people are kind, compassionate, empathetic, humane, very intelligent, resourceful, generous and hospitable.

rejection.details: If you want the UK Government to give work permits to illegal immigrants who have been in the UK for over 3 years, we could accept a petition on that.
